title: Meditation: Discovering Inner Space
itunes:title: Meditation: Discovering Inner Space
description:
Meditation: Discovering Inner Space - By imagining the space inside the body, we discover the continuous space of awareness that is the source and essence of all aliveness. This meditation is adapted from Open Focus Meditations led by Les Fehmi, Ph.D. in The Open Focus Brain.

Join Tara's email community at http://eepurl.com/6YfI, to receive exclusive updates, events, and meditations.
- Get a free download of Tara’s 10 min meditation: “Mindful Breathing: Finding Calm and Ease,"
- plus a bonus gift: "8 Essential Tips to Nourish Your Meditation Practice."
